name: CL_RSN_FOR_VISIT
description: This table contains basic information for records in the Reason for Visit (HRV) master file.

columns.name: REASON_VISIT_ID
columns.description: The ID of the record associated with the Reason for Visit.

columns.name: REASON_VISIT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the Reason for Visit record.

columns.name: DISPLAY_TEXT
columns.description: This contains the name that displays to a user when viewing the Reason for Visit.
